attributes.action: Universities should accept non-paid internships for international students
attributes.additional_details: Many students asked their student services to respond on the situation and no one is coming forth and solving the problem. Many universities are not even showing a least concern
attributes.background: During this crisis many companies are not offering paid internships, and univeraities are not accepting non paid interships. Moreover, the companies are going back if the person is on tier-4 visa.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about things that are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Whether to allow their students to take on unpaid internships is a matter for individual universities, not the Government or Parliament. 

UK law already allows international students on a Tier 4 (general) visa to take on unpaid internships. You can find out more here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/843003/T4_Migrant_Guidance_October_2019.pdf.
